articles.title: Over 5 Lakh Children Bitten by Dogs in India in 2024
articles.description: Nearly 21.95 lakh dog bite cases were reported in 2024, with more than 5 lakh involving children under 15.
articles.content: Government data shows 21,95,122 dog bite cases in 2024, of which 519,704 involved children under 15 years of age across India. The figures were shared in a written reply to Parliament.
articles.author: Harikishan Sharma

articles.title: 37 Lakh Dog Bite Cases Reported in India, Children at High Risk
articles.description: Data suggests about 37 lakh total dog bite cases in 2024, with children under 15 accounting for a significant share.
articles.content: Analyses indicate dog bite incidents in India may total 3.7 million in 2024, with children frequently among the victims and rabies a continuing concern.
articles.author: NDTV Bureau

articles.title: Supreme Court Voices Alarm Over Rising Dog Bite Cases Among Children
articles.description: The Supreme Court expressed concern over stray dog bites, especially those affecting children.
articles.content: India’s Supreme Court noted the 'very disturbing' increase in dog bites nationwide and highlighted instances of children being injured.

articles.title: Supreme Court Orders Removal of Stray Dogs Amid Bite Surge
articles.description: Delhi’s top court ordered authorities to relocate stray dogs following bite incidents, many involving children.
articles.content: The Delhi High Court directed local authorities to move stray dogs to shelters after increased reports of attacks, including those injuring children.

articles.title: 9-year-old Girl Mauled by Stray Dogs in Sambhal
articles.description: A tragic attack led to the death of a 9-year-old girl after stray dogs bit her arm.
articles.content: In Uttar Pradesh’s Sambhal district, a group of stray dogs attacked and fatally injured a young girl, raising urgent calls for better stray control.

articles.title: Four Children Bitten by Dog in Saharanpur Village
articles.description: Multiple children were severely injured when a stray dog attacked them.
articles.content: A viral report detailed four children suffering dog bites in a rural Uttar Pradesh locale, prompting emergency medical treatment.

articles.title: Pit Bull Dog Attacks Two Children in Hapur
articles.description: A domestic breed dog attacked children playing outside, injuring them.
articles.content: In Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, a pit bull bit two young children, leading to hospitalisation and debate over pet safety.

articles.title: Punjab Govt Expands Vaccine Clinics After Child Dog Bite Cases Rise
articles.description: Free anti-rabies vaccination extended to better protect vulnerable groups including children after rising dog bite cases.
articles.content: Punjab expanded anti-rabies vaccine access to 881 clinics, improving care for bite victims, many of whom are children and others exposed in daily life. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
